title: Workspace ONE Hub Service
desc.uem: Configure UEM settings to integrate UEM with VMware Hub services. This  integration is needed to display apps configured in UEM console within Workspace ONE Intelligent Hub app. After you configure the settings click Save.
desc.branding: Configure how you want Hub to look and feel and incorporate your organization's brand.
desc.customization: Configure the settings below to customize Hub features, functionality and content.
error.page.desc: You are not authorized to access this resource. Contact your IT administrator if you have received this message in error.
error.page.setup.desc: To launch Hub Configuration, first establish trust between Hub Services and Workspace ONE UEM.
error.page.setup.steps: Just follow these two easy steps:
error.page.setup.list.one: Complete VMware Identity Manager configuration. Active Directory set up is not required for Hub Catalog.
error.page.setup.list.two: Return to the Hub Configuration page and click Launch to begin configuring and customizing Hub Services.
error.page.setup.confirm: Do you want to configure VMware Identity Manager to establish trust between Hub Services and Workspace ONE UEM?
invalid.access.token: Invalid Access Token. Contact customer support for more information.
mdm.invalid.group: Invalid Group ID. Go to IDM Console > Identity & Access Management > Setup > AirWatch to validate your Group ID and try again.
mdm.api.forbidden: API access denied. Go to IDM Console > Identity & Access Management > Setup > AirWatch to check your Workspace ONE UEM configuration and try again.
uem.password.error: Failed to read valid x509 certificate with provided PKCS12 file and password.
customization.web.desc: The Hub Web Browser experience will be the same experience as the Intelligent Hub app, which can be customized using the settings below.
customization.features.desc: Select the features to include within Hub. Some features require VMware Identity Manager to be configured.
customization.feature.label.custom.label: Label
We recommend using name that is no more than 6 letters. Long label may impact employee experience.
customization.custom.tab.default.label: Home
customization.rating.delete.title: Are you sure?
customization.rating.delete.info: All existing app ratings data will be permanently deleted and cannot be reversed.
customization.tooltip.vidm.message: Requires VMware Identity Manager to be configured.
customization.tooltip.custom.message: Embed company resources portal like intranet as a custom tab within Hub app.
customization.tooltip.app.rating.message: Allows employees to like or dislike apps.
Allows you to export a CSV report of likes and dislikes for apps.
customization.tooltip.virtualapps.messag: When disabled, virtual apps will not appear in Catalog on mobile devices and tablets under 9" in size.
customization.tooltip.hub.message: Enables Hub Experience in the Browser on mobile devices and desktops.
branding.image.type.error: Invalid Format. The image format must be JPEG, PNG or GIF. Please upload again
branding.company.logo.size: Format: JPEG, PNG, or GIF, Max size: 200 x 80 px
branding.desktop.icon.size: Format: JPEG, PNG, or GIF, Max size: 52 x 64 px
branding.body.content: Allows you to select background, font and icon color
branding.reset.title: Reset Branding Confirmation
branding.reset.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all branding to the default settings
branding.update.success: Branding successfully updated, any end user portal changes will be reflected in the next 5 minutes.
branding.reset.success: Branding successfully reset to default, any end user portal changes will be reflected in the next 5 minutes.
preview.graphic.hint: Graphic depicts visual effects, not actual view.
branding.color.field.invalid: Invalid Format. The format must be #123456. Please try again
desc.customization.catalog: Add new sections that you want to display in the Apps tab. Drag and drop to change the order.
app.customization.label.name: Name
app.customization.list.Promotions.label: Promotions
app.customization.list.Promotions.desc: Displays featured apps at the top of the app catalog to promote them to your users.
app.customization.list.NewApps.label: New Apps
app.customization.list.NewApps.desc: Displays apps for 30 days after being added to the Hub Catalog.
app.customization.list.Recommended.label: Recommended
app.customization.list.Recommended.desc: Displays apps recommended by IT administrators.
app.customization.list.Popular.label: Popular
app.customization.list.Frequentapps.desc: Displays most frequently used apps based on usage.
app.customization.list.Custom.label: Custom
app.customization.list.Custom.desc: Displays apps or categories of apps customized by the IT administrator.
app.customization.list.Favorites.label: Favorites
app.customization.list.Favorites.desc: Displays Favorite apps and Bookmarks set by the employee.
app.customization.list.Categories.label: Categories
app.customization.list.Categories.desc: Displays list of app categories allowing employees to search for apps by category.
Any apps or categories that have been added to the list at the top of the app catalog will be cleared when switching from one promotion type to another.
Any apps or categories that have been added to promotions will be cleared when switching from one promotion type to another.
Are you sure you want to switch?
app.customization.catalog.empty: Your App Catalog is empty. Adding at least one new section is strongly recommended, otherwise, employees' home screen will display all apps available to the employee after logging in.
app.customization.promotion.all.apps.rem: We did not find apps or categories configured within UEM or VMware Identity Manager.
app.customization.promotion.some.apps.re: Some apps or categories that were marked for promotion are no longer configured within UEM or VMware Identity Manager.
app.customization.promotion.invalid.apps: The app you entered does not exist.
app.customization.promotion.invalid.cate: The category you entered does not exist.
The app list below may differ from the app list in Hub as server is temporarily unavailable.
app.customization.promotion.apps.missing: The app list below may differ from the app list in Hub as some apps may have been removed from Workspace ONE UEM or VMware Identity Manager.
app.customization.promotion.categories.m: The category list below may differ from the category list in Hub as some categories may have been removed from Workspace ONE UEM or VMware Identity Manager, or the server is temporarily unavailable.
app.customization.promotion.app.limit.me: For best experience, we recommend promoting 5 or less apps.
app.customization.promotion.categories.l: For best experience, we recommend promoting 5 or less categories.
app.customization.promotion.app.search.u: Unable to fetch apps. Please try after some time.
app.customization.promotion.app.search.p: Request to fetch catalog information partially successful.
app.customization.promotion.category.sea: Unable to fetch categories. Please try after some time.
Request to fetch category information partially successful.
